text: "Just the Way You Are" is a 2010 song by American singer-songwriter Bruno Mars and is the lead single from his debut studio album Doo-Wops & Hooligans. It topped the single charts in Australia, Austria, Canada, Ireland, Israel, the Netherlands, New Zealand, the United Kingdom and the United States. It went to the top 10 in Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Italy, Norway, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Sweden and Switzerland.
